regular_title.p_2: you can be part of a great dream that feeds millions of people around the world.

Introduction.title: About Us...
Introduction.row1: We are a collective investment platform that makes you a partner in rice farming in the Colombian countryside! If you are an investor with vision, you can now support local farmers while reaping returns.
Introduction.row2: Have you ever dreamed of being part of the cultivation process that feeds millions of people around the world? Now is your chance! We invite you to be one of the pioneers in investing in the projects of our rice farmers, register now!

errors.emailRequired: The e-mail address is not valid
errors.selectionRequired: You have to select an option

investor.title: Investor
investor.description: Here you will find a paragraph with the details on how to pre-register as an investor

agricultor.title: Rice Planter
agricultor.description: Here you will find a paragraph with the details on how to pre-register as a Rice Planter

reasons_elements.title: Attractive Yields
reasons_elements.description: By investing in GreenFund, you have the opportunity to earn interesting returns on your capital in a relatively short period of time. Our platform connects investors with rice farmers, allowing you to participate in the growth and success of the agricultural sector.

reasons_elements.title: Positive impact in the Colombian countryside
reasons_elements.description: By investing in GreenFund, you are directly contributing to the development of the Colombian countryside and supporting farmers. Your investment helps rice farmers to access the necessary inputs for their crops, generating a significant social and economic impact.

reasons_elements.title: Portfolio diversification
reasons_elements.description: Investing in GreenFund offers an opportunity to diversify your portfolio. By adding agricultural investments to your portfolio, you can reduce risk and gain exposure to a growing sector with strong fundamentals.

reasons_elements.title: Transparency and security
reasons_elements.description: At GreenFund, we take transparency and security seriously. We provide you with clear and detailed information about the projects and rice farmers you partner with, and we work to ensure your investments are protected.

reasons_elements.title: Simple and convenient access
reasons_elements.description: Our platform facilitates the investment process. You can invest from the comfort of your home, through an intuitive and friendly interface. Without complications or barriers, GreenFund offers you easy access to investment opportunities in the agricultural sector.

FeaturedProjects.section_title: Participate in one of our projects

steps_elements.title: Step 1
steps_elements.description: The user decides to invest a specific amount of money in our digital platform.

steps_elements.title: Step 2
steps_elements.description: With that capital, Greenfund finances the cultivation of a partner company dedicated to the cultivation and processing of cannabis. This financing covers all expenses from the sowing of the seeds until the moment the plant is sold or processed into any of its derivatives.

steps_elements.title: Step 3
steps_elements.description: Once the associated company sells the plant, it is given a percentage of the profits generated. Greenfund also receives a percentage of the profits as compensation for its management and participation in the process.

steps_elements.title: Step 4
steps_elements.description: Finally, investors receive their initial invested capital along with their profits.

successful_preregistration.description: Pre-registration completed successfully. You will be receiving very proto upcoming news. Welcome!.
